channel.title: Making a website like this WITH ONE PROGRAM! Post Questions please!
channel.description:
Okay, here we go first go to: http://www.smfhost.com
Then click downloads and download it...
Then you don't really need to open the folder just some stuff that you can do on the web..
Now Make a account by clicking "Create User/Account" or what ever
Then Fill it all out...
Now go to your "e-mail" and if you see something like this http://"Yournamehere".smfhost.com/ComfremAccount or what ever Remeber it might be in "Junk Mail."
Then Copy that into your Browser (aka) "Address Bar"
Then your ready to edit Remeber that file I told you not to touch in till now?
Read it and your set! Have Fun!
[i][b][glow=red,2,300]Credits: Drokan[/glow][/b][/i]

item.description:
@Drokan wrote:

Okay, here we go first go to: http://www.smfhost.com

Then click downloads and download it…

Then you don’t really need to open the folder just some stuff that you can do on the web…

Now Make a account by clicking “Create User/Account” or what ever

Then Fill it all out…

Now go to your “e-mail” and if you see something like this http://“Yournamehere”.smfhost.com/ComfremAccount or what ever
Remeber it might be in “Junk Mail.”

Then Copy that into your Browser (aka) “Address Bar”

Then your ready to edit Remeber that file I told you not to touch in till now?

Read it and your set! Have Fun!
